availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Scott Brown (Franklin County, KY, farmer, Kentucky Adjutant General)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Franklin County native. Educated at Centre College in Danville, Kentucky. Farmer in Franklin County in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860. Adjutant General of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from May 24, 1859 to October 12, 1861.
